label: typeschema
command: bun run typecheck && bun run format && bunx biome lint --diagnostic-level=error --write --unsafe && bun run test typeschema

label: register
command: bun run typecheck && bun run format && bunx biome lint --diagnostic-level=error --write --unsafe && bun run test register

label: codegen
command: bun run typecheck && bun run format && bunx biome lint --diagnostic-level=error --write --unsafe && bun run test
